duties_responsibilities.duty: Pre-rinse, wash, and sanitize equipment per company standards.
Inspect and complete sanitation checklist following each wash.
Work with the sanitation manager and quality control technician to correct cleaning deficiencies.
Keep the area clean and organized.
Set up line and all equipment to company standards prior to a production run.
Follow safety rules and food safety policies and procedures.
Responsible for establishing priorities and working independently without direct supervision.
Understand and use cleaning chemicals, safety aspects, measurements, and applications of the chemical.
Clean and sanitize baking/ingredient prep equipment which includes pots, pans, and all types of surfaces.
Perform tasks that require equipment safety, lockout/tag out procedures, and proper covering of moisture-sensitive equipment.
